article.title: Rockwell Collins to Provide Aircraft Radios
article.text: Rockwell Collins Inc., Cedar Rapids, Iowa, is being awarded a $7,694,320 modification to a previously awarded firm-fixed-priced contract (N00019-09-C-0069) to exercise an option for the procurement of AN/ARC-210(V) Electronic Radios and ancillary equipment for a variety of aircraft. This option provides for the procurement of 80 RT-1939(C)/ARCs and 80 994M-4 Link 11 smart mounts without isolators. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
